1.name: Reacting Force
1.desc: When successfully Blocking an enemy with Ben's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the DMG dealt by the blocked enemy is reduced by 30% for 15s.

flavor.0: "Every action has an equal and opposite reaction. So why do you have to bash things head-on?"

2.name: Offense Through Defense
2.desc: When successfully triggering a Block Counter during Ben's <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, inflict an additional 300% of Ben's DEF as DMG.

flavor.0: Unlike other bear Thirens, Ben remains patient when fighting.
flavor.1: He believes if he keeps his defenses up, he can wait until the enemy reveals their weakness.

3.name: Careful Accounting
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
3.flavor: Financial responsibility demands mastering cost-efficiency and utilizing every available resource to enhance both the team and oneself.

4.name: Agile Adaptation
4.desc: When successfully blocking enemy DMG with Ben's invulnerable effect during his <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the following counter deals 30% more DMG.

flavor.0: Ben's professional accounting instincts let him adapt dynamically based on the situation.
flavor.1: Whether dealing with accounts or enemies, it's important to achieve the best results at the lowest cost.

5.name: Meticulous Detail
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2
5.flavor: Ben's keen eye doesn't miss a single error in statements. The same goes for combat, where he gets progressively stronger as he corrects mistakes.

6.name: Wild Spirit
6.desc: After launching an attack or follow-up attack during Ben's <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, Daze inflicted by <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</ct> is increased by 20%, lasting 12s.

flavor.0: Bear Thirens are different from canine Thirens.
flavor.1: They can't be appeased with food alone.
flavor.2: When they lose their temper, the only thing you can do is run for your life...
flavor.3: —The discontinued "Be a Good Neighbor! 100 Tips for Getting Along With Thirens"
